arts.ttl: Battling Aston Villa earn comeback win at Fulham
arts.sum: There was a frantic start to the match, with Villa attacker Morgan Rogers cancelling out Raul Jimenez's earlier goal inside the opening nine minutes. Aston Villa climbed back into the Premier League's top four after coming from behind to beat Fulham 3-1 in an entertaining clash at Craven Cottage that saw both teams finish with 10 men.

arts.ttl: Silva bemoans Andersen red card after Fulham defeat
arts.sum: Fulham reaction. The post Silva bemoans Andersen red card after Fulham defeat appeared first on West London Sport.

arts.ttl: Villa boss Emery will keep pushing 'talented' Rogers
arts.sum: Aston Villa manager Unai Emery praises the "commitment" of Morgan Rogers after the midfielder scored his first goal of the season in Aston Villa's 3-1 win over Fulham in the Premier League at Craven Cottage.

arts.ttl: Morgan Rogers nails what was 'massive' about Aston Villa's win at Fulham
arts.sum: Morgan Rogers is hopeful Aston Villa's impressive 3-1 win at Fulham will be the catalyst for a strong run of results with the club playing six more games in the space of 18 days before the November international break. Speaking to Premier League Productions after full-time, Rogers said: "They scored in the first five minutes, but we knuckled down after that and we dominate pretty much most of the game.

arts.ttl: Italiano sees clear lesson for Bologna ahead of Aston Villa trip
arts.sum: Bologna wasted a two-goal lead against strugglers Genoa, and Vincenzo Italiano insists his players must...

arts.ttl: Unai Emery salutes ‘best in world’ Emiliano Martinez after Villa win at Fulham
arts.sum: Martinez saved a penalty at Craven Cottage.

Fulham manager Marco Silva says his team did not have their "best performance at all" as the home side conceded two own goals in their 3-1 defeat by Aston Villa in the Premier League at Craven Cottage.

arts.ttl: Four goals, red card and a penalty save! | Villa overcome Fulham
arts.sum: FREE TO WATCH: Highlights from Aston Villa's win against Fulham in the Premier League.

arts.ttl: Villa into fourth after comeback win at Fulham
arts.sum: Aston Villa came from behind to beat Fulham 3-1 in a highly entertaining Premier League clash at Craven Cottage on Saturday in which the home side missed a penalty and both teams had a man sent off.

arts.ttl: Aston Villa’s new talismen turn on heroics in comeback win over Fulham
arts.sum: Fulham 1-3 Aston Villa: Morgan Rogers and Ollie Watkins overturned the deficit in a strong performance for Unai Emery’s men
